verses.verse: Then again<WH3254> Abraham<WH85> took<WH3947> a wife,<WH802> and her name<WH8034> was Keturah.<WH6989>
And she bore<WH3205> him<WH853> Zimran,<WH2175> and Jokshan,<WH3370> and Medan,<WH4091> and Midian,<WH4080> and Ishbak,<WH3435> and Shuah.<WH7744>
And Jokshan<WH3370> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Sheba,<WH7614> and Dedan.<WH1719> And the sons<WH1121> of Dedan<WH1719> were<WH1961> Asshurim,<WH805> and Letushim,<WH3912> and Leummim.<WH3817>

And the sons<WH1121> of Midian;<WH4080> Ephah,<WH5891> and Epher,<WH6081> and Hanoch,<WH2585> and Abida,<WH28> and Eldaah.<WH420> All<WH3605> these<WH428> were the children<WH1121> of Keturah.<WH6989>
And Abraham<WH85> gave<WH5414> <WH853> all<WH3605> that<WH834> he had unto Isaac.<WH3327>

But unto the sons<WH1121> of the concubines,<WH6370> which<WH834> Abraham<WH85> had, Abraham<WH85> gave<WH5414> gifts,<WH4979> and sent them away<WH7971> from<WH4480> <WH5921> Isaac<WH3327> his son,<WH1121> while he yet<WH5750> lived,<WH2416> eastward,<WH6924> unto<WH413> the east<WH6924> country.<WH776>

And these<WH428> are the days<WH3117> of the years<WH8141> of Abraham's<WH85> life<WH2416> which<WH834> he lived,<WH2416> a hundred<WH3967> threescore and fifteen<WH7657> <WH8141> <WH2568> years.<WH8141>
Then Abraham<WH85> gave up the ghost,<WH1478> and died<WH4191> in a good<WH2896> old age,<WH7872> an old man,<WH2205> and full<WH7649> of years; and was gathered<WH622> to<WH413> his people.<WH5971>

And his sons<WH1121> Isaac<WH3327> and Ishmael<WH3458> buried<WH6912> him in<WH413> the cave<WH4631> of Machpelah,<WH4375> in<WH413> the field<WH7704> of Ephron<WH6085> the son<WH1121> of Zohar<WH6714> the Hittite,<WH2850> which<WH834> is before<WH5921> <WH6440> Mamre;<WH4471>
The field<WH7704> which<WH834> Abraham<WH85> purchased<WH7069> of<WH4480> <WH854> the sons<WH1121> of Heth:<WH2845> there<WH8033> was Abraham<WH85> buried,<WH6912> and Sarah<WH8283> his wife.<WH802>

And it came to pass<WH1961> after<WH310> the death<WH4194> of Abraham,<WH85> that God<WH430> blessed<WH1288> his son<WH1121> <WH853> Isaac;<WH3327> and Isaac<WH3327> dwelt<WH3427> by<WH5973> the well Lahai-roi.<WH883>

Now these<WH428> are the generations<WH8435> of Ishmael,<WH3458> Abraham's<WH85> son,<WH1121> whom<WH834> Hagar<WH1904> the Egyptian,<WH4713> Sarah's<WH8283> handmaid,<WH8198> bore<WH3205> unto Abraham: <WH85>

And these<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of the sons<WH1121> of Ishmael,<WH3458> by their names,<WH8034> according to their generations:<WH8435> the firstborn<WH1060> of Ishmael,<WH3458> Nebajoth;<WH5032> and Kedar,<WH6938> and Adbeel,<WH110> and Mibsam,<WH4017>
And Mishma,<WH4927> and Dumah,<WH1746> and Massa,<WH4854>
Hadar, <WH2316> and Tema,<WH8485> Jetur,<WH3195> Naphish,<WH5305> and Kedemah: <WH6929>

These <WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Ishmael,<WH3458> and these<WH428> are their names,<WH8034> by their towns,<WH2691> and by their castles;<WH2918> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> princes<WH5387> according to their nations.<WH523>

And these<WH428> are the years<WH8141> of the life<WH2416> of Ishmael,<WH3458> a hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> and seven<WH7651> years:<WH8141> and he gave up the ghost<WH1478> and died;<WH4191> and was gathered<WH622> unto<WH413> his people.<WH5971>

And they dwelt<WH7931> from Havilah<WH4480> <WH2341> unto<WH5704> Shur,<WH7793> that<WH834> is before<WH5921> <WH6440> Egypt,<WH4714> as thou goest<WH935> toward Assyria:<WH804> and he died<WH5307> in<WH5921> the presence<WH6440> of all<WH3605> his brethren.<WH251>
And these<WH428> are the generations<WH8435> of Isaac,<WH3327> Abraham's<WH85> son:<WH1121> Abraham<WH85> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Isaac: <WH3327>

And Isaac<WH3327> was<WH1961> forty<WH705> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> when he took<WH3947> <WH853> Rebekah<WH7259> to wife,<WH802> the daughter<WH1323> of Bethuel<WH1328> the Syrian<WH761> of Padan-aram,<WH4480> <WH6307> the sister<WH269> to Laban<WH3837> the Syrian.<WH761>

And Isaac<WH3327> entreated<WH6279> the LORD<WH3068> for<WH5227> his wife,<WH802> because<WH3588> she<WH1931> was barren:<WH6135> and the LORD<WH3068> was entreated<WH6279> of him, and Rebekah<WH7259> his wife<WH802> conceived.<WH2029>

And the children<WH1121> struggled together<WH7533> within<WH7130> her; and she said,<WH559> If<WH518> it be so,<WH3651> why<WH4100> am I<WH595> thus?<WH2088> And she went<WH1980> to inquire<WH1875> of<WH853> the LORD.<WH3068>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto her, Two<WH8147> nations<WH1471> are in thy womb,<WH990> and two<WH8147> manner of people<WH3816> shall be separated<WH6504> from thy bowels;<WH4480> <WH4578> and the one people<WH3816> shall be stronger<WH553> than the other people;<WH4480> <WH3816> and the elder<WH7227> shall serve<WH5647> the younger.<WH6810>
And when her days<WH3117> to be delivered<WH3205> were fulfilled,<WH4390> behold,<WH2009> there were twins<WH8380> in her womb.<WH990>
And the first<WH7223> came out<WH3318> red,<WH132> all over<WH3605> like an hairy<WH8181> garment;<WH155> and they called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Esau.<WH6215>

And after that<WH310> <WH3651> came<WH3318> his brother<WH251> out, and his hand<WH3027> took hold<WH270> on Esau's<WH6215> heel;<WH6119> and his name<WH8034> was called<WH7121> Jacob:<WH3290> and Isaac<WH3327> was threescore<WH8346> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> when she bore<WH3205> them.

And the boys<WH5288> grew:<WH1431> and Esau<WH6215> was<WH1961> a cunning<WH3045> hunter,<WH6718> a man<WH376> of the field;<WH7704> and Jacob<WH3290> was a plain<WH8535> man,<WH376> dwelling<WH3427> in tents.<WH168>
And Isaac<WH3327> loved<WH157> <WH853> Esau,<WH6215> because<WH3588> he did eat<WH6310> of his venison:<WH6718> but Rebekah<WH7259> loved<WH157> <WH853> Jacob.<WH3290>
And Jacob<WH3290> sod<WH2102> pottage:<WH5138> and Esau<WH6215> came<WH935> from<WH4480> the field,<WH7704> and he<WH1931> was faint: <WH5889>

And Esau<WH6215> said<WH559> to<WH413> Jacob,<WH3290> Feed<WH3938> me, I pray thee,<WH4994> with<WH4480> that same<WH2088> red<WH122> pottage; for<WH3588> I<WH595> am faint:<WH5889> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> was his name<WH8034> called<WH7121> Edom.<WH123>
And Jacob<WH3290> said,<WH559> Sell<WH4376> me this day<WH3117> <WH853> thy birthright.<WH1062>
And Esau<WH6215> said,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> I<WH595> am at the point<WH1980> to die:<WH4191> and what profit<WH4100> shall this<WH2088> birthright<WH1062> do to me?
And Jacob<WH3290> said,<WH559> Swear<WH7650> to me this day;<WH3117> and he swore<WH7650> unto him: and he sold<WH4376> <WH853> his birthright<WH1062> unto Jacob.<WH3290>

Then Jacob<WH3290> gave<WH5414> Esau<WH6215> bread<WH3899> and pottage<WH5138> of lentils;<WH5742> and he did eat<WH398> and drink,<WH8354> and rose up,<WH6965> and went his way:<WH1980> thus Esau<WH6215> despised<WH959> <WH853> his birthright.<WH1062>
